name: ASUNDER (Team Undesirables)
description:
ASUNDER is a class project from Team Undesirables during the Game Mechanics course. Play as a green slime cube as they traverse challenging terrain to reach their ship to leave this planet!

Design: 
Jonathan Angulo 
Jacob Arnold 
Wyatt Curtiss

Controls: 
Movement - A and D 
Jump - Space 
Divide - F 
Interact - E 
Pause - P
